name: Sarisa
description:
You are in a tropical place and you have the task to free it from monsters! Equip yourself with weapons and fight against a total of 3 enemy types (melee, ranged and a boss). 

The character can pick up weapons, jump, swim, punch and block!

The enemies leave hearts, with which you can replenish your health. An inventory has also been added, which hoards usable items.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

I Key- Open/Close Inventory

E Key - Grab Item

Left Mouse Button - Attack (only when Weapon attached)

Right Mouse Button - Block (only when shield attached)

This project is my first contact with the Unreal Engine. It is a non-commercial project. Since the Unreal Engine is used, a good PC is needed.

A start and pause menu has not been implemented yet. 

Have fun and feel free to give me feedback =)
